files.patch:
@@ -67,1 +67,3 @@
-
+  // Chunk size should be at least (unmodified) page size as using multiple threads 
+  // pretouch on a single chunk can decrease performance.
+  size_t chunk_size = MAX2(PretouchTask::chunk_size(), page_size);
@@ -73,1 +75,0 @@
-  size_t chunk_size = MAX2(PretouchTask::chunk_size(), page_size);
